biz.manex.andaman7.injector.webservice.REST

Class AndamanContextService

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.manex.andaman7.injector.webservice.REST.CustomRestService
      • biz.manex.andaman7.injector.webservice.REST.AndamanContextService

  • public class AndamanContextService
extends CustomRestService
    Contains methods to interact with the context service of Andaman7.
    Author:
    Pierre-Yves Derbaix (pierreyves.derbaix@gmail.com)
    Copyright A7 Software (http://www.manex.biz)
    Date: 24/01/2015.

        public AndamanContextService(java.lang.String urlServer,
                             java.lang.String apiKey,
                             java.lang.String login,
                             java.lang.String password)
        Builds a context service connection to the server.
        Parameters:
        urlServer - the URL of the server
        apiKey - the API key
        login - the login used for the authentication
        password - the password used for the authentication

                                                java.lang.String apiKey,
                                                java.lang.String login,
                                                java.lang.String password)
        Returns the unique instance of the EHR service corresponding to the URL server and the login.
        Parameters:
        urlServer - the URL of the distant server
        apiKey - the API key
        login - the login needed to authenticate
        password - the password needed to authenticate
        Returns:
        the unique instance of the EHR service

      • getTamiXml

        public org.w3c.dom.Document getTamiXml(int currentXmlVersion)
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Returns an XML file that describes the TAMIs according to the current version of the file.
        Parameters:
        currentXmlVersion - the current version of the XML file
        Returns:
        the XML document received from the server if a new version exists or null if no new version exists
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there was an error with the connection to the server
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if there was an error while parsing the XML document

                                                           boolean isAccepted)
                                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Sets the acceptance level of a community request.
        Parameters:
        otherRegistrarId - the UUID of the registrar that has sent the request
        isAccepted - the boolean that says if the registrar is accepted or not
        Returns:
        the HTTP response to the request
        Throws:
